RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 56. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 7 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS MARPLE broke sharply and had good early speed three wide, dropped back a bit on the turn, drifted to the six path entering the stretch, responded with a burst of speed when put to left handed urging in mid stretch, made the lead late and won going away. BELLAVALENCIA pressed the pace two wide and finished second best. VAVITE wide early, dropped inside on the turn, offered a mild bid along the rail in upper stretch then was outfinished. SKIRTS KID away alertly, set the pace along the inside, shook clear in upper stretch then gave way late. INDY LITES trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Skirts Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, shook clear upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Bellavalencia
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Indy Lites
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Marple
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3 wide, drifted 6path, late burst, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Vavite
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide early, dropped inside turn, rail bid, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 19900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 7 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 7 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILDCAT BILL away alertly, set all the pace and widened through deep stretch under mild right handed urging to win as much the best while taken in hand late. TWINSPIREDJOEY pressured the winner into the stretch then was no match while well clear for second. THANKSDAD never far back, improved position inside rivals in upper stretch. SURROUNDER had speed three wide into the stretch then weakened. CATMAN JACK trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Catman Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Bill
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew off, much the best, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Thanksdad
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, improved position inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Twinspiredjoey
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, no match for winner, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Surrounder
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 30800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 7 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 7 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PANAMANIAC broke in front then gave up the lead soon thereafter, pressed the pace two wide for five sixteenths of a mile, made the lead set the balance of the pace and drew off in the stretch under a strong hand ride. AUJARA stalked the pace three wide and finished well clear for second outside the winner in the six path. PERFECTINGTHEVIEW set a pressured pace along the inside down the backstretch and weakened in the stretch. SOLE FACTOR trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Perfectingtheview
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Panamaniac
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, pressed 2w, took over entering turn, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Aujara
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Sole Factor
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 7 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,5 00 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIPLEY EFFECT unhurried, rallied two wide on the far turn to make the lead nearing the quarter pole, set the balance of the pace and finished full of run under strong handling to win going away. LEWD close up two wide, offered a mild bid into the stretch, drifted out to the seven path under left handed urging late and finished clear for second. FIONA trailed for a half, loomed boldly four wide nearing the quarter pole then leveled off. ROWDY DAISY chased the pace two and three wide for six furlongs then weakened. ROSE KNOWS sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set the pace into the far turn then was used up. SKY was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Ripley Effect
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, rallied 2 wide far turn, drew off, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Rowdy Daisy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2-3wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Lewd
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up 2 wide, drifted left handed urging lane, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Fiona
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, loomed boldly 4 wide 1/4 pole, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Rose Knows
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace 2nd turn, used up,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 13100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANCING FOR MONEY never far back, closed willingly, drifted to the five path entering the stretch then drifted into the three path near the furlong marker and proved best by the narrowest of margins under left handed urging. TRAMA QUEEN away alertly, set a pressured pace for a half, shook clear on the far turn, dug in gamely through deep stretch under left handed urging and just failed. BAD AND BEAUTIFUL pressed the pace along the inside into the far turn, shifted out to the six path in upper stretch then faded. DUDE'S MIST DATE passed tiring rivals. RAG TOWN with the second flight inside, failed to respond. TWELVE SHARP was no factor. LIFENHOWULIVIT stalked the pace two wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Bad and Beautiful
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Rag Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing for Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 5path, 2wide, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Trama Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, drew clear, just failed

ENTRY.NAME: Dude's Mist Date
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Twelve Sharp
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Lifenhowulivit
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 97. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 7 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 7 Allowed 4 lbs. (Cl aiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUIET AMIGO had speed from the start along the inside, angled out on the turn, rallied two wide under left handed urging through deep stretch and got up in the final strides. AUTHENTIC COWTOWN stalked the pace into the stretch, surged three wide under right handed urging and just missed. UOTTALIKEIT away alertly, set the pace two wide then along the inside, shook clear in upper stretch and was outfinished. BEVERLY PARK offered a mild bid outside four wide into the stretch then was outfinished.

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet Amigo
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, angled out turn, surged 2w, left urging, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Beverly Park
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move outside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Uottalikeit
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 2 wide, inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Authentic Cowtown
ENTRY.OWNER: McDonald James H and Authentic Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, dug in 3 wide, just missed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 7 Allowed 4 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY BROTHER CAM settled just off the lead along the rail, waited into the stretch, was in tight near the furlong marker, angled out two wide, responded with a burst of speed under a hand ride to make the lead late and drew off. PATIO PARTY set a pressured pace along the inside until deep stretch then was no match for the winner. BLAME IT ON EDDIE never far back, inched closer two wide outside the winner into the far turn then was outfinished. VICTORY DIVISION gained a slight lead briefly leaving the clubhouse turn, kept pressure two wide into the stretch then weakened. MUGSY MALONE with the second flight three wide, weakened in the stretch. BEAT THE DEALER trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: My Brother Cam
ENTRY.COMMENT: waited inside, lacked room, angled 2 wide 1/8pole, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Blame It On Eddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Mugsy Malone
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Beat the Dealer
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Patio Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Victory Division
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief lead, pressed 2 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26400. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUCCEED slow early, closed rapidly between horses two wide to make the lead in deep stretch and drew off under right handed urging. POT COMMITTED chased the pace in the four path into the stretch, made the lead before the furlong marker then was no match for the winner. EAST BY WEST unhurried early, passed tiring rivals in the three path through the stretch. TWELVE MINUS ONE was hustled out to a clear lead soon after the start, set the pace into the stretch and weakened late. FUNNY MAN wide early, dropped inside entering the far turn, offered a mild bid nearing the top of the stretch then came up empty. ZINFATUATION was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: East by West
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, passed tiring rivals 3path

ENTRY.NAME: Succeed
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, closed fast between horses, 2 wide, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Twelve Minus One
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, clear lead, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Pot Committed
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4path, led late, 4 wide, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Zinfatuation
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Funny Man
ENTRY.OWNER: Pelfrey Ruth Nicoletta Gerald Tait Bob Hertrich III Frederick and Blazing Meadow
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide early, middle move, inside, empty,
